data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Ar Riyad, Saudi Arabia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ar Riyad, Saudi Arabia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Ar Riyad, Saudi Arabia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 9 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Ar Riyad, Saudi Arabia.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 5,364,277 who are far from you in Ar Riyad, Saudi Arabia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Ar Riyad who will make disciples who make disciples.
Spirit, I pray that the Persian people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Ar Riyad, Saudi Arabia from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 29,595 believers in Ar Riyad, Saudi Arabia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Over 95.98 percent of the people of Ar Riyad are far from Jesus.

location.name: Ar Riyad
location.people_groups_list: Rohingya, Bedouin, Arab, Saudi - Najdi, Hindi, Kabardian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rohingya (526,000), Bedouin (1,321,000), Arab, Saudi - Najdi (13,821,000), Hindi (171,000), Kabardian (27,000)
